channel.title: The pk server ---((((((Endless-Pkz))))))---
channel.description:
Pleas, before you read this. Im working on server only 2-3 hours each day, so it will take long when it will be released. But, when i done the server it will still take some days when i set download link.
[center]Hello guys, if you see im making a source, and if youl see, hes old. This server is based on reapagescape V2, still the best server for me. So i making a source, if you heard about gamepure its never fininshed -.-
[/center] [center]Olright lets start with some commands: ::home = teleports to home ::players = shows the players ::thief = teleports you to the thiefing area ::modinfo = info for getting mod ::slayer = teleports to slayer area ::jad = tele you to jad to get firecape. ::barrows = teleports to barrows ::yell = usage: ::yell hello, will make that holy server see that text. ::afk = when your not at your computer for a moment ::pk = teleports to pk area ::edge = teleports to edgeville 1v1 pk ::mb = teleports to mage bank ,more coming soon :p
Now right the FEATURES: Pking in party room, wich named: Danger shops. New home You can pk on the most places, like barrow, jad,... You can pk near home, click on a rare crate and you will teleported. Training replaced to the old allstar training. Icon minigame is back. Fishing skill, to get free food. Fast training. Good economy. Thief to get money. Removed all skills because this is a PK server. Some new shops Shops replaced, some deleted.
Need to be added: New pk places New safe spots Some more secret ideas :eek:[/center]
[center]Now the pictures:[/center]
[center]Home [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2uidijc.jpg[/img] Rare crates [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/mj8djd.jpg[/img] Slayer [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2gttgub.jpg[/img] Harder barrows [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/30dfnrd.jpg[/img] Thief area: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/301ex5l.jpg[/img] Edge: [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2eametd.jpg[/img] [/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 03:00:56 pm[/size][hr]Im fixing pictures

item.title: The pk server ---((((((Endless-Pkz))))))---
item.dc:creator: @roli roli
item.description:
@roli wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:7, topic:295451”]You need some grammer lessons

::yell = usage: ::yell hello, will make that holy server see that text.

Gf, btw if this is a pk server, why are you bothering with skills?[/quote]

Ppl wil train the skills and get them all 99, and then there will not be much ppl to pk.
So it was better to remove him, wich if i should host this.
There will be only 20 ppl when its on mopar.
And 8 ppl or less when its not, so.

Read full topic

item.title: The pk server ---((((((Endless-Pkz))))))---
item.dc:creator: @roli roli
item.description:
@roli wrote:

Pleas, before you read this.
Im working on server only 2-3 hours each day, so it will take long when it will be released.
But, when i done the server it will still take some days when i set download link.

[center]Hello guys, if you see im making a source, and if youl see, hes old.
This server is based on reapagescape V2, still the best server for me.
So i making a source, if you heard about gamepure its never fininshed -.-

[/center]
[center]Olright lets start with some commands:
::home = teleports to home
::players = shows the players
::thief = teleports you to the thiefing area
::modinfo = info for getting mod
::slayer = teleports to slayer area
::jad = tele you to jad to get firecape.
::barrows = teleports to barrows
::yell = usage: ::yell hello, will make that holy server see that text.
::afk = when your not at your computer for a moment
::pk = teleports to pk area
::edge = teleports to edgeville 1v1 pk
::mb = teleports to mage bank
,more coming soon

Now right the FEATURES:
Pking in party room, wich named: Danger shops.
New home
You can pk on the most places, like barrow, jad,…
You can pk near home, click on a rare crate and you will teleported.
Training replaced to the old allstar training.
Icon minigame is back.
Fishing skill, to get free food.
Fast training.
Good economy.
Thief to get money.
Removed all skills because this is a PK server.
Some new shops
Shops replaced, some deleted.

Need to be added:
New pk places
New safe spots
Some more secret ideas :eek:[/center]

[center]Now the pictures:[/center]

[center]Home

Rare crates

Slayer

Harder barrows

Thief area:

Edge:

[/center][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 03:00:56 pm[/size][hr]Im fixing pictures
